Job description:
Front-End Flutter & React
Main Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain high-performance front-end applications using Flutter for mobile apps and React for our web-based platform.
Work closely with our team to ensure a seamless, intuitive, and optimized user experience (UX).
Actively participate in the design and improvement of user interfaces (UI) while following best practices (UI design skills are an asset but not mandatory).
Ensure smooth integration between front-end applications and existing back-end systems.
Work independently and propose creative solutions to technical challenges.
Test, debug, and optimize code to ensure the performance and stability of applications.
What We’re Looking For:
Technical Skills:
Expertise in Flutter for mobile development.
Proficiency in React for web development.
Strong UX design skills (mandatory).
Knowledge of UI design principles (an asset).
Solid understanding of REST APIs and back-end integration.
Personal Qualities:
Self-starter mindset: You learn quickly and solve problems independently.
Strong organizational skills: You can manage your time and priorities effectively.
Passion for innovation and continuous improvement.
Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, evolving environment

Front-End Developer (React)
Responsibilities:
Build, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable code using React Native.
Optimize applications for maximum performance, responsiveness, and overall quality.
Conduct code reviews to ensure code quality, and share best practices with other developers.
Keep up-to-date with the latest industry trends, technologies, and best practices in mobile development.
Qualifications:
1+ years of experience with React Native development and data structures
Skills:
React Native/ JavaScript/ TypeScript/ Kotlin/ Java/ Swift
RESTful APIs and mobile libraries for networking, specifically Axios
Remote push notification
Firebase, getstream.io, Elastic Search
Ideal Candidate Qualities:
Fluent in English
Excellent at communication and teamwork
Passionate about solving problems and meticulous with details
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and manage multiple priorities.
Interested in sports

Junior Front-End Developer
Full job description
Conduct websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript according to the design received and connect them to various APIs.
Develop websites to meet the W3C standard and be able to display them on the web browser.
Apply and customize the framework and plugin to conform to the assignment.
Work with UI designer to develop, analyze, and design UX / UI that is suitable for users.
Be able to apply new technologies to improve work performance.
IDEAL CANDIDATE:
A Bachelor’s degree in a related field.
At least 1-3 years of experience in Front-End Development.
Proficiency in developing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Ability to develop Front-End using JavaScrip Framework/Library such as VueJs, ReactJs, or Angular is a plus.
Great code readability skill.
Experience of using Git (Version Code Control) is a plus.
Experience in developing Responsive Website, Javascript, jQuery, CMS Framework is a plus.
Responsibility to deliver assignments on time.
Enthusiasm to learn new technologies in order to apply them to the organization for maximum efficiency.
Ability to work as a team to achieve the ultimate goal of the organization.
Capability to work prudently.

Front-End Developer
About the job:
As a .NET Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high quality software solutions using .NET technologies. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze requirements, architect solutions, and implement scalable and efficient applications.
 Key Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and maintain software applications using the .NET framework and related technologies (C#, ASP.NET, MVC, Entity Framework, etc.).
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements, and translate them into technical specifications and solutions.
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code following coding standards and best practices.
Conduct thorough unit testing and debugging to ensure the quality and reliability of software applications.
Work closely with cross-functional teams, including other developers, designers, and project managers, to deliver high-quality software solutions on time and within budget.
Continuously research and evaluate new technologies, tools, and methodologies to improve development processes and enhance software products.
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to other team members to maintain code quality and consistency.
Troubleshoot issues, investigate root causes, and implement effective solutions in a timely manner to minimize downtime and disruptions.
Document technical specifications, processes, and procedures to ensure knowledge sharing and maintain system documentation up-to-date.
Collaborate closely with the manager and team members, actively participating in all tasks assigned.
 Requirement and Qualification:

Strong knowledge of C#, ASP.NET, .NET Core, and MVC.
Minimum 1-3 years of experience in software development.
Familiarity with source control systems such as GIT or TFS Familiarity with Agile software development methodologies.
Good to have skills: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and front-end frameworks such as Angular, React, or Vue.js.
Good to have skills: MS SQL and SOLR.
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot complex issues.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field.

Front-End Developer
Paired is a global staffing and recruiting agency that pairs remote work with top-tier talent. We admire the importance of innovative social media strategies and are committed to connecting talented individuals with great companies that need their unique skills. Our mission is to provide great jobs to gifted people, regardless of location. 

Our Client is a company that specializes in developing custom software solutions, including application and system development tailored to specific business needs. They also offer outsourced 24/7 customer support services, enabling businesses to provide continuous, high-quality support to their clients. Additionally, they provide professional website design services, creating sleek and responsive websites to enhance user experience and help businesses stand out from the competition. 

They are seeking a talented and experienced Front-End Developer with a strong background in designing and developing user interfaces for both mobile applications and desktop platforms. The ideal candidate will have 5+ years of professional experience, with a deep understanding of front-end development. This role requires proficiency in Figma, as well as strong skills in creating interactive prototypes for reviewing and implementing designs. 
As a key member of their development team, you will collaborate with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders to ensure the delivery of high-quality, user-friendly, and visually stunning products. 

Responsibilities:
Design and develop engaging, responsive, and intuitive user interfaces for both mobile and desktop platforms.
Collaborate closely with product managers and developers to ensure seamless integration of design with front-end development.
Implement and optimize front-end code (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) to deliver high-quality, pixel-perfect user interfaces.
Maintain and evolve design systems and component libraries to ensure consistency across products and platforms.
Advocate for best practices in front-end development.
Stay current with emerging development trends, tools, and technologies.
Requirements:
Expert-level knowledge of front-end technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and frameworks like React or Angular.
Experience with responsive and adaptive design principles, ensuring designs look and function beautifully on a wide variety of devices and screen sizes.
Strong understanding of user-centered design principles, interaction design, and usability testing methodologies.
Ability to translate complex problems into elegant, user-friendly solutions.
Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
Knowledge of design systems, component libraries, and the ability to maintain consistency in design across various platforms.
Experience with version control systems (e.g., Git) and Agile development environments.
Familiarity with accessibility standards (WCAG) and experience in designing inclusive, accessible user interfaces.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience working in fast-paced, collaborative environments such as startups or tech companies.
Familiarity with back-end development concepts and an understanding of how front-end design integrates with back-end services.
Experience in creating and maintaining documentation for design processes, style guides, and user flows.
